name: Xiangling
description: A renowned chef from Liyue. She's extremely passionate about cooking and excels at making her signature hot and spicy dishes.

skillTalents.name: Dough-Fu
skillTalents.description:
Tấn công thường
Performs up to 5 consecutive spear strikes.
Trọng Kích
Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to lunge forward, dealing damage to enemies along the way.
Nhảy Dậm
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging enemies along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

upgrades.name: Thể Lực Trọng Kích Tiêu Hao
Sát Thương Khi Rơi Từ Độ Cao Thấp/Cao

skillTalents.name: Guoba Attack
skillTalents.description: Summons Guoba the Panda. Guoba continuously breathes fire, dealing AoE Hỏa DMG.

skillTalents.name: Hỏanado
skillTalents.description:
Displaying her mastery over both fire and polearms, Xiangling sends a Hỏanado whirling around her.

The Hỏanado will move with your character for so long as the ability persists, dealing Hỏa DMG to all enemies in its path.

passiveTalents.name: Crossfire
passiveTalents.description: Increases the flame range of Guoba by 20%.

passiveTalents.name: Beware, It's Super Hot!
passiveTalents.description: When Guoba Attack's effect ends, Guoba leaves a chili pepper on the spot where it disappeared. Picking up a chili pepper increases ATK by 10% for 10s.

passiveTalents.name: Chef de Cuisine
passiveTalents.description: When Xiangling cooks an ATK-boosting dish perfectly, she has a 12% chance to receive double the product.

constellations.name: Crispy Outside, Tender Inside
constellations.description: Enemies hit by Guoba's attacks have their Hỏa RES reduced by 15% for 6s.

constellations.name: Oil Meets Fire
constellations.description: The last attack in a Tấn công thường sequence applies the Implode status onto the enemy for 2s. An explosion will occur once this Thời Gian Kéo Dài ends, dealing 75% of Xiangling's ATK as AoE Hỏa DMG.

constellations.name: Deepfry
constellations.description:
Increases the Level of Hỏanado by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Slowbake
constellations.description: Hỏanado's Thời Gian Kéo Dài is increased by 40%.

constellations.name: Guoba Mad
constellations.description:
Increase the Level of Guoba Attack by 3.
Tăng nhiều nhất 15 cấp.

constellations.name: Condensed Hỏanado
constellations.description: For the Thời Gian Kéo Dài of Hỏanado, all party members receive a 15% Hỏa DMG Bonus.
